title: Best of The Program | Guests: Dave Isay & Spencer Coursen | 5/10/21
description:
StoryCorps’ Dave Isay joins with a great Mother’s Day story. President Biden downplayed April’s dismal jobs report, but Glenn explains what’s truly going on. Threat management expert Spencer Coursen joins to review his new book, "The Safety Trap," and his top safety tips.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
